S

search(ActionEvent) - Method in class controllers.AlbumController
Search method will be triggered via the Search button and it will guide the user to the Search View Page in which the user will be able to perform a variety of searches
search1(ActionEvent) - Method in class controllers.SearchController
Method that allows user to perform a photo search using one tag only
SearchController - Class in controllers
Search Controller provides help to the user to search pictures by Tag and Date Range and displaying the results in a Table View
SearchController() - Constructor for class controllers.SearchController
 
SerializableImage - Class in models
JavaFX's image class does not implement Serializable so in order to store an Image its respective place in the photo in the userlist we must create a serializable object that will store the pictures bit map so that it can recreate the image whenever that object is called Basically it allows persistent storage of the Images in the UserList object
SerializableImage() - Constructor for class models.SerializableImage
 
setAlbums(ArrayList<Album>) - Method in class models.User
 
setCap(ActionEvent) - Method in class controllers.PhotoController
Helper method to set Caption in a photo upon user action
setCaption(String) - Method in class models.Photo
 
setDate(LocalDate) - Method in class models.Photo
 
setImage(Image) - Method in class models.SerializableImage
stores the image's pixels so that it can map it to new objects with get Image
setName(String) - Method in class models.Album
To set the name of the album
setTags(ArrayList<Tag>) - Method in class models.Photo
